message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this exceptional product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,300,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the $1,300,000 price point. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,200,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $1,200,000 is below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $1,250,000?

I understand your position, Alice. I will consider your proposal of $1,250,000. However, I still believe there's room for negotiation. My counteroffer would be $1,225,000. I hope this brings us closer to an agreement.
